orbital.title: Framework
orbital.main: This is high-performance vert.x based distributed java game server designed for realtime 2D/3D multiplayer games requiring low-latency realtime computations
orbital.subtext: Project is in active development. Looking for contributors and sponsors to make this stuff widely used in future. Support this project by stars on github If you like idea.

features.title: Features
features.room: Room-based game logic and components. Basic extensible Matchmaker
features.support: HTTP + websocket. Tcp/udp server mode in development
features.monitoring: Prometheus + micrometer + web app with monitoring
features.geometry: Lucene/JTS geo spatial indices and collision detection
features.objects: Advanced game objects and computations (in development)
features.oidc: Auth-protected REST API and social accounts oidc providers (in development)

game.title: Multiplayer game
game.description: Java/Vertx/Typescript/React/Phaser highload game room and battle-royale based multiplayer

about.main: I am software developer since 2015 with extensive experience in commercial/fintech/highload/distributed systems development including games. Tech lead/system architect, team lead, mentor.
